channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pedestrian crossing traffic lights not working, 1st March
item.description:
Pedestrian crossing traffic lights not working on Evesham road nr junction with Albermarle Gate/west approach drive
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Richmond West Approach Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 100s of bottles, cans, fast food wrappers, plastic in roadside ditches, 1st March
item.description:
This rubbish has been accumulating for years in the ditches either side of the B4213 and A38. It's too dangerous for individuals to clear up. This accumulation will be dangerous to wildlife and ultimately to humans. It makes us look like a 3rd world country
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4213, Deerhurst
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy manhole cover, 28th February
item.description:
Some manholes were fixed last week. But one man hole ( roughly outside number 21 greenways) hasn't been repaired. When people drove over the manhole it's so noisy and I can it inside my house. Please can this be fixed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 49 Greenways, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 28th February
item.description:
Many holes, some significant, at dip in road through woods

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Withington

item.title: Lamp post for on Goldsmith Road has been hit, 28th February
item.description:
The lamppost has a leaning over a 30Â° angle to vertical I need securing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 42 Goldsmith Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Sinking manhole chambers on crossroads, 28th February
item.description:
Crossroads at junction between Clarence Road, A46 Portland Street and A435 Evesham Road (GL52 2NU). 2 chambers in the middle of the crossroads are sinking - need replacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 59 Portland Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinking manhole chamber cover, 28th February
item.description:
B4633 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham. Westbound lane, outside no. 14 Gloucester Road, GL51 8PQ (between Stoneville Street and Bloomsbury Street). Chamber cover is sinking into road, creating a deep depression - needs fixing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden Bollard rotted and wobbly, 27th February
item.description:
Sadly these wooden bollards at the crossing point on Caernarvon Road by the spar shop have rotted already. One is very wobbly and I think has fallen over a few times and been stood up by folk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 304 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road sign post rusted through and obscured, 27th February
item.description:
Fly tipping is frequently seen in this location. The relevant sign is obscured, contains out of date information and the post on which it is mounted is broken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Furzen Lea Manor Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 27th February
item.description:
